vote.title: Authorize a three-year service price agreement for citywide fire extinguisher and sprinkler system maintenance and repairs - Safety Control LLC in the estimated amount of $1,999,019.68 and Total Fire & Safety, Inc. in the estimated amount of $6,440,520.34, lowest responsible bidders of four - Total estimated amount of $8,439,540.02 - Financing: General Fund ($3,324,871.66 $5,234,088.40), Capital Construction Fund ($1,909,216.74), Aviation Fund ($1,549,381.32), Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($843,190.50), Sanitation Operation Fund ($677,029.50), and Equipment and Fleet Management Fund ($135,850.30) (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize a three-year service price agreement for citywide fire extinguisher and sprinkler system maintenance and repairs - Safety Control LLC in the estimated amount of $1,999,019.68 and Total Fire & Safety, Inc. in the estimated amount of $6,440,520.34, lowest responsible bidders of four - Total estimated amount of $8,439,540.02 - Financing: General Fund ($3,324,871.66 $5,234,088.40), Capital Construction Fund ($1,909,216.74), Aviation Fund ($1,549,381.32), Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($843,190.50), Sanitation Operation Fund ($677,029.50), and Equipment and Fleet Management Fund ($135,850.30) (subject to annual appropriations)
